title: Manage Welder Qualifications
description: A quality manager needs to verify that a welder is qualified to perform a specific type of weld before they start work.

tasks.description: Identify the welder and the specific welding procedure (WPS) they will be using.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager has the welder's name and the WPS number.

tasks.description: Query the welder qualification database to retrieve the welder's qualification records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the list of all welding procedures the welder is certified for.

tasks.description: Verify that the welder holds a current qualification for the specific WPS required for the job.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the welder is qualified for the required procedure and that their certification has not expired.
